metadata.methodology: Systematic collection of all verifiable public predictions

pundits.name: Balaji Srinivasan
pundits.bio: Entrepreneur, angel investor, and tech philosopher. Former CTO of Coinbase and General Partner at a16z.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $1,000,000 within 90 days
predictions.quote: I will mass $1M bet that Bitcoin will hit $1M in 90 days. This is not financial advice, this is not about the price of Bitcoin, this is about the price of the dollar.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin was at ~$27,000 on June 17, 2023. Balaji conceded and paid the bet.

predictions.claim: US banking system will experience major crisis within weeks
predictions.quote: Banks are going to fail. Many of them. This is the beginning of a banking crisis.
predictions.outcome_notes: SVB, Signature Bank, and First Republic all failed in March-May 2023.

predictions.claim: FTX collapse will trigger contagion across crypto industry
predictions.quote: This is going to ripple through the entire industry. Many more will fall.
predictions.outcome_notes: BlockFi, Genesis, Voyager, and others collapsed following FTX.

predictions.claim: The metaverse will be bigger than social media within 5 years
predictions.quote: The metaverse is going to be massive. Bigger than social media.
predictions.outcome_notes: Still pending - 5 year timeframe

pundits.name: Jim Cramer
pundits.bio: Host of CNBC's Mad Money. Former hedge fund manager. Known for his stock picks and market calls.

predictions.claim: Meta stock is a buy at current levels
predictions.quote: I think Meta is a steal here. Facebook is not going away.
predictions.outcome_notes: META dropped from ~$200 to ~$90 by end of 2022 (-55%)

predictions.claim: The bear market is over
predictions.quote: I think we've seen the bottom. The bear market is over.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 continued falling, hit new lows in October 2022

predictions.claim: Netflix stock will continue its dominance
predictions.quote: Netflix is the king of streaming. Buy Netflix.
predictions.outcome_notes: Netflix crashed 70% in first half of 2022 after subscriber loss

predictions.claim: SVB Financial is solid, don't panic
predictions.quote: Silicon Valley Bank is fine. Don't worry about it.
predictions.outcome_notes: SVB collapsed 2 days later - largest bank failure since 2008

predictions.claim: Nvidia has peaked, time to take profits
predictions.quote: Nvidia has had an incredible run but I think it's time to ring the register.
predictions.outcome_notes: NVDA went from ~$450 to ~$900 in that period (+100%)

predictions.claim: 2024 will be a strong year for stocks
predictions.quote: I'm bullish on 2024. This is going to be a good year.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 up significantly in 2024

pundits.name: Cathie Wood
pundits.bio: Founder, CEO & CIO of ARK Invest. Known for disruptive innovation investing and bold price targets.

predictions.claim: Tesla will reach $3,000 per share by 2026
predictions.quote: Our price target for Tesla is $3,000 by 2026. The autonomous opportunity is massive.
predictions.outcome_notes: Tesla currently ~$250 (split-adjusted). Needs 12x to hit target.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $1,000,000 by 2030
predictions.quote: We believe Bitcoin could reach $1 million by 2030.
predictions.outcome_notes: Long-term prediction still pending

predictions.claim: ARKK will recover and outperform in next 5 years
predictions.quote: We are confident our strategies will deliver superior returns over the next 5 years.
predictions.outcome_notes: ARKK down significantly since prediction, still pending

predictions.claim: Zoom will be a major winner in hybrid work era
predictions.quote: Zoom is positioned to dominate the hybrid work future.
predictions.outcome_notes: Zoom stock continued declining, hybrid work didn't boost it

predictions.claim: Deflation is coming, not inflation
predictions.quote: We believe deflation is the bigger risk, not inflation. Prices will come down.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation fell significantly from 6%+ to ~3%, but not deflation

pundits.name: Peter Schiff
pundits.bio: Economist, author, and gold bug. Known for predicting the 2008 financial crisis and constant dollar collapse predictions.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will crash below $10,000 in 2022
predictions.quote: Bitcoin is heading much lower. I expect it to fall below $10,000.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin bottomed at ~$15,500 in 2022, never went below $10k

predictions.claim: The US dollar will collapse
predictions.quote: The dollar is going to crash. This is the beginning of the end.
predictions.outcome_notes: Dollar index actually strengthened significantly in 2022-2023

predictions.claim: Bitcoin going to zero after FTX collapse
predictions.quote: FTX is just the beginning. Bitcoin is going to zero.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin recovered to all-time highs above $70,000

predictions.claim: Gold will outperform stocks in 2023
predictions.quote: Gold is the place to be. It will crush stocks this year.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 up ~24% in 2023, Gold up ~13%

predictions.claim: Bitcoin ETF approval will cause crash, not rally
predictions.quote: Sell the news. The Bitcoin ETF will be a disaster for the price.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin rallied to new ATH above $70k after ETF approval

pundits.name: Nate Silver
pundits.bio: Statistician, writer, and founder of FiveThirtyEight. Known for election forecasting and probabilistic thinking.

predictions.claim: Republicans will win House in 2022 midterms
predictions.quote: Republicans are favored to win the House. Our model gives them about 80% chance.
predictions.outcome_notes: Republicans won House 222-213

predictions.claim: Democrats will hold Senate in 2022 midterms
predictions.quote: Democrats are slight favorites to hold the Senate. About 55% in our model.
predictions.outcome_notes: Democrats held Senate 51-49

predictions.claim: 2024 presidential election is a tossup
predictions.quote: This is genuinely a coin flip. Our model has it 50-50.
predictions.outcome_notes: Correctly identified uncertainty; Trump won narrowly

predictions.claim: Biden approval will stay below 45% through midterms
predictions.quote: Biden's approval is stuck in the low 40s. I don't see it recovering before November.
predictions.outcome_notes: Biden approval remained 40-43% through midterms

pundits.name: Michael Saylor
pundits.bio: Executive Chairman of MicroStrategy. Bitcoin maximalist. Led corporate Bitcoin treasury strategy.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will never go below $30,000 again
predictions.quote: I don't think Bitcoin ever goes below $30,000 again. The institutional adoption is too strong.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin fell to ~$15,500 in November 2022

predictions.claim: MicroStrategy will never sell its Bitcoin
predictions.quote: We are not sellers. We will hold our Bitcoin forever.
predictions.outcome_notes: MicroStrategy has continued accumulating, never sold

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will be recognized as legitimate asset class in 2023
predictions.quote: 2023 is the year Bitcoin becomes mainstream. ETF approval is coming.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin ETF approved January 10, 2024

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will hit new all-time high in 2024
predictions.quote: Bitcoin is going to break through $69,000 and beyond this year.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin hit new ATH above $73,000 in March 2024

pundits.name: Paul Krugman
pundits.bio: Nobel Prize-winning economist. NYT columnist. Known for macroeconomic commentary and predictions.

predictions.claim: Inflation is transitory and will resolve by end of 2022
predictions.quote: Inflation will come down significantly by year end. This is transitory.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation remained above 6% through end of 2022

predictions.claim: No recession in 2022
predictions.quote: I don't see a recession this year. The economy is fundamentally strong.
predictions.outcome_notes: US avoided technical recession in 2022 despite fears

predictions.claim: 2023 recession is highly likely
predictions.quote: I think a recession in 2023 is more likely than not at this point.
predictions.outcome_notes: US economy grew 2.5% in 2023, no recession

predictions.claim: Crypto is fundamentally worthless and will collapse
predictions.quote: Crypto has no fundamental value. This whole thing is going to zero eventually.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin hit new ATH, ETF approved, institutional adoption grew

pundits.name: Larry Summers
pundits.bio: Former US Treasury Secretary. Harvard Professor. Known for early inflation warnings.

predictions.claim: Inflation will require significant Fed rate hikes
predictions.quote: The Fed is behind the curve. They will need to raise rates much more aggressively than they're projecting.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed raised rates from 0% to 4.25% by end of 2022

predictions.claim: Inflation will remain elevated through 2023
predictions.quote: This inflation is not going away quickly. Expect elevated inflation through 2023.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation remained above target (3%+) through 2023

predictions.claim: Fed will keep rates high through 2024
predictions.quote: The Fed is not going to cut rates as quickly as markets expect.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed held rates at 5.25-5.50% through mid-2024

predictions.claim: US will avoid severe recession despite rate hikes
predictions.quote: A soft landing is possible. It's not guaranteed, but I don't think we need a severe recession.
predictions.outcome_notes: US achieved rare soft landing - inflation fell without recession
